title: Supreme Court Rules U.S. Passports Must Say Jerusalem, Not Israel
teaser: The court says U.S. citizens born in Jerusalem must list "Jerusalem" and not "Israel" as their birthplace on their passports.
contentencoded:
The Supreme Court ruled today that U.S. citizens born in Jerusalem must list “Jerusalem” and not “Israel” as their birthplace on their passports.

Here & Now’s Jeremy Hobson talks with Dahlia Lithwick, who covers the Supreme Court for Slate, about the case and the significance of the court’s decision.

Guest

  • Dahlia Lithwick, writes about the courts and the law for Slate. She tweets @Dahlialithwick.
